metadata.title: CVE-2020-13625 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
PHPMailer before 6.1.6 contains an output escaping bug when the name of afile attachment contains a double quote character. This can result in thefile type being misinterpreted by the receiver or any mail relay processingthe message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-phpmailer - 6.0.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
